alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southern Tularosa Basin; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:19PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of of west central Otero, south central Sierra, northeastern Luna and Dona Ana Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds of 30 to 50 mph moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hatch, Leasburg, Rincon, Las Cruces, Northrup Landing, White Sands National Monument, White Sands Missile Range Headquarters, Jornada Range, Radium Springs, NMSU Main Campus, Dona Ana, Derry, Salem, Garfield, Mesilla, Fairacres, Organ, Talavera, East Mesa and San Pablo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 110 and 147. Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 1 and 52. Highway 70 in New Mexico between mile markers 150 and 183. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
